Does anyone know how to make a two data plot such that one of the data samples is showed as the volume transactions in `TradingChart` function? Thanks. EDIT: Sorry the english. So, I have two data samples. I want to plot one of them in a ordinary plot using, for example, `ListLinePlot`, but the second data sample to be showed bellow in the same way the volume is ploted in `TradingChart`. ![enter image description here](http://i.stack.imgur.com/qRV9h.gif) EDIT2: In resume I have 2 data samples. I want the first to be ploted in the main graph, and the second bellow.
